name: Asquired Taste
description:
Play as a squire to a nearly invincible knight, gathering ingredients from felled enemies to fuel his mighty stomach!

Controls:

  • Movement - WASD
  • Dodge - SPACE / LMOUSE
  • Cook - F / RMOUSE

Made in 72 hours for Minijam: 129 'Poison', with the limitation "You are not a hero." The limitation took us by surprise, we had planned to make a toootally different game, but just flipping around the 'good guys' and 'bad guys' felt like a lazy interpretation of the limitation. So we thought of a more mechanical interpretation of the limitation, you aren't the hero! You follow the hero around and support them with your cooking. 

Updated 15 minutes after the deadline to fix a couple bugs.
